inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getResponsePlan.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the response plan.

tags.description: The tags applied to the response plan.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getResponsePlan.

actions.description: (Optional) The actions that the response plan starts at the beginning of an incident.

chatChannels.description: The Chatbot chat channel used for collaboration during an incident.

displayName.description: The long format of the response plan name. This field can contain spaces.

engagements.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the contacts and escalation plans that the response plan engages during an incident.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

integrations.description: Information about third-party services integrated into the response plan. The following values are supported:

name.description: The name of the PagerDuty configuration.

tags.description: The tags applied to the response plan.
